snippet: At least 60 people may have been arrested in the protests over the screening of “Pinochet,” a sympathetic look at the dictator’s rule. Pinochet loyalists held their own rally outside the theater.
abstract: Chaos erupts outside a theater in Santiago, Chile, where supporters of the former dictator Gen Augusto Pinochet were attending a screening of Pinochet, documentary film that offers a sympathetic look at the dictator's rule; at least 64 people are reportedly arrested in the protests.
lead_paragraph: At least 60 people may have been arrested in the protests over the screening of “Pinochet,” a sympathetic look at the dictator’s rule. Pinochet loyalists held their own rally outside the theater.

headline.main: Hundreds Protest Screening of Pro-Pinochet Film in Chile
headline.print_headline: Hundreds Protest Screening of Pro-Pinochet Film in Chile
